attrs.name: local
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: getLocale
attrs.desc: User-defined interface for obtaining the system language list. This parameter is mandatory when the framework service is not used.

attrs.name: popper-class
attrs.desc: Add a class name for the popper. For details, see the popover component.

attrs.name: popper-append-to-body
attrs.desc: Indicates whether to insert the pop-up box to the body element. If a fault occurs in locating the fault in the dialog box that is displayed, you can set this attribute to false (for details, see the select component).
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: getCurrentLocale
attrs.desc: Customized interface for obtaining the current language. This parameter is mandatory when the framework service is not used.

attrs.name: getChangeLocaleUrl
attrs.desc: Customized language update service interface. This parameter is mandatory when the framework service is not used and change-lang is not configured.
